fullplot: Bruce Nolan, a television reporter in Buffalo, N.Y., is discontented with almost everything in life despite his popularity and the love of his girlfriend Grace . At the end of the worst day of his life, Bruce angrily ridicules and rages against God and God responds. God appears in human form and, endowing Bruce with divine powers, challenges Bruce to take on the big job to see if he can do it any better.
plot: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.
title: Bruce Almighty

tomatoes.consensus: Carrey is hilarious in the slapstick scenes, but Bruce Almighty gets bogged down in treacle.
